name: Heptagon
description: Heptagon is the digital catalyst for your business growth. Founded in 2017, we are a Digital Consulting and Product Engineering company providing end-to-end technology solutions enabling companies to leapfrog their digital transformation journey. We go beyond traditional IT services by providing an entire gamut of design-led engineering services including creative solutions, user experience design, web, mobile & hybrid application development, DevOps, quality assurance to cloud & infrastructure management. We design and build customized enterprise software and also provide ready-to-deploy solutions.
Headline: Heptagon - A Quess Corp Company, is a Digital Consulting and Product Engineering Powerhouse

enhanced_description: Heptagon, a Quess Corp Company, is a digital consulting and product engineering powerhouse providing end-to-end technology solutions. Founded in 2017, they act as a digital catalyst for business growth, guiding companies through their digital transformation journey. Their services span design-led engineering, including creative solutions, user experience design, web, mobile, and hybrid application development, DevOps, quality assurance, and cloud & infrastructure management. They also specialize in intelligent automation and leverage Internet of Things (IoT) technologies. Heptagon designs and builds customized enterprise software and offers ready-to-deploy solutions, with a stated business objective of improving employee happiness and engagement.
